page.title: 13Nettlebed Art Festival
page.content: The village has a thriving Art Society which holds an annual Exhibition over the May Bank Holiday weekend. Many local artists and craftsmen and women exhibit their works.Some of these are for sale and others are just shown for pleasure. The Society use the Primary School's hall for the show and the children also have a lot of their paintings and drawings on display. On the Saturday night there is a private viewing and then the festival is open to the public on the Sunday and the Bank Holiday Monday.
